title: Workshop on Self-Regulated Learning (SRL) Strategies in Online Learning Communities (OLC)

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Application of a mixed-methods-based teaching approach focusing on acquiring self-regulated learning (SRL) strategies through online learning communities (OLC) in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the three-stage Self-Regulated Learning (SRL) strategy (planning, execution, reflection) in online learning environments (OLC).
Learners can present correlations between technology acceptance (perceived usefulness/ease of use) and SRL strategies through survey data analysis.
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans in smartphone-based OLC and document execution results in reflective journals.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
